details.title: Responsibilities
items: Overhauling the previous design with a fresh and modern look on top of Bootstrap.
Developing an interface in a feedback-based environment to comply with the needs and requirements of the clients.
Rebranding and designing company’s logo and schema.

details.title: Achievements
items: Developed a minimal and responsive user interface to be injected in an existing .NET application.
Maintained an extensive development environment based on SASS and Pug to create reusable components based on a highly customisable framework.
Redesigned the company’s logo, as well as a new 3D version with subtle CSS animation for the hero of the website.
